description.en:
McPepe’s is the infinite Pepe image generator. McPepe’s mission is to deliver all possible variations of Pepe to as many people as possible. McPepe’s is open to the public to generate images for free on launch. Users may submit an order, and within seconds, a Pepe will be generated by the McPepe’s AI.

Minting: Any McPepe’s order can be minted as an ERC721 on Ethereum or inscribed as an Ordinal on Bitcoin. Orders are now open on mcpepes.com as well as in our convenient drive-through app on Telegram and Discord. Mints are free (+gas).

Earning: You can earn $PEPES tokens from others generating with your carefully crafted input.
